unnormalised: Maka konnem civil law vixim vicharlem, mhunn mhaka dista ek sadhi somzonni divchem mhunn. Basically, civil law vyokti vo organization hangache zhogde samballta, crime nhoi (tem criminal law, bhai!). Property disagreements, jeisen tumchea proxeyachem konnem bhit bhitor vosun vosoun dhadd bandlem (ek classic case!), vo contractual issues, jeisen builder tumchem ghor agreement promann purai korina ani tumi Rs. 50 lakhs divallean ailem purnn natllelea ghorakhatir! Tem soglem rights ani responsibilities vixim asta, ani compensation vo khas action korun vostu sarkhi korunk prayatn kortat.

Hea processachim survat courtan ek suit file korun zata – district court vo High Court astoli, claim kitlem asa tanche voir depend astolem. Tumak ek lawyer zai poddtolo, Adv. Sharma astolo mhunn ani plaint (je tumchi case sangta) draft korunk ani judge mukhar evidence divpak. Think documents, witnesses... ani soglem jazz. Dusrea teamak apunnak defend korunk mellta, of course. Hem soglem vell lagta – mhojem ganvan ek land ownership chalu asa 1985 thaun mhunn maka aikuk ailem!
normalised: Konnem mhaka civil law vixim vicharlem, mhunn mhoji ek mulbhut somzonni sangta. Multhoven, civil law mon’xam modem va sanstham modem zhogddim nirvar kortta, gunhe nhoi (tem criminal law, bhai!). Property vixim asloli addchan samzun ghe, zoxem tumcho xezari tumchi bhumyacher dhig bhondta (ek classic case!), va contract vixim prosn, zoxem ek builder tumchem ghor poorn korina agreement pormonnem ani tumkam ek motta rupiya panch zero lakhs adure aslole ghorak dil’le, ti zhogddim civil law nirvar kortta! Tem sogllem haq ani zobabdari vixim asa, ani compensation va khasgi kamam korun vosti sudharunk vavurta.

unnormalised: Udkak, judge decide kartolo konn sarkha ani kitem remedy diunk zai. Tem monetary compensation (jeisen Rs. 10,000 damages khatir) asunk xakta, ek khas order (jeisen dhadd moddunk mhunn mhunnnlem), vo anik kitem tori. Tem soglem Civil Procedure Code (CPC) ani anik relevant laws hancheant dila. Lawyeracho opinion ghe, esp. jevhah stakes unch asat – jeisen property dispute crores chyo asat!
normalised: Hea kamachi survat courtant ek suit file korun zata – ti district court va High Court legit assa, kitlem demand asa tatun addarun asa. Tumkam ek lawyer lagtalo, Advocate Sharma zait, plaint darj korunk (taka tumchi case somzavn sangta) ani uprant judgeak praman ditolo. Documents, sakxi… tem sogllem samzun ghe. Dusre vatinim tankam rakhonn korunk mellta. Tem sogllem korunk khub vell lagta – hanvem aikolem mhojea ganvantli zomin konachi mhunn case ek hazar noxim ani asi panch vorsan pasun chol’ta!

Nimannem, judge nirnoi ditolo konn sarki ani taka kitem mellunk zai. Hem rupiya dha hazar nuqsan bhortai (compensation mhunn), ek khasgi hukum (zoxem hanvem sangloli dhig toddunk), va anik kitem legit. Tem sogllem C-P-C ani dusrea zakonanim ullekh kelam. Ek lawyerak vixex porimanan vichara, toxench tumchem kitem dhokreat asa mhunn paka kortat – zoxem tumchi property kitlem dhokreat asa mhunn crores rupiya dhokreat asonk xokta!
